name: Sunsilk Soft & Smooth Shampoo
description: Sunsilk Nourishing Soft & Smooth Shampoo nourishes hair deeply and makes it beautifully soft and smooth. Its unique blend of five natural oils and exclusive formula nourishes hair deeply without making it greasy or limp. It contains Argan oil, Babasu oil, Almond oil, Camellia oil and Coconut Oil to nourish your hair. Also helps retain the beautiful softness & smoothness of your hair.   *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
